mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Strock, David
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Christiansburg, Champaign Co., Ohio [Christiansburg, Champaign County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Strock, David Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound left arm 3 inches below the coracoid process of the acromian passing backward and downward lodged near the angle of 9 rib. Ball extracted on the field. Location Wounded: Hancock, MD. Date Wounded: 1864/07/31. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospital Columbus 1865/03/14.
